title: France panorama. [No. 69/24]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The first round - the presidential elections. 2. 25 years ago: the Normandy landings - the 25th anniversary of the Normandy landings. 3. Gateway to the sun - Paris-Madrid by train without a transfer. 4. Le Bourget rendexvous - Concorde and the International Air and Space Show. 5. paul Delvaux, the dreamer - the Belgian painter’s two Paris exhibitions.
